result.eng: Strangely enough, she got her education in England and not in Ireland.
result.ga: Aisteach go leor ba i Sasana a fuair sí a cuid scolaíochta agus ní in Éirinn
result.orig: Aisteach go leor ba i Sasana a fuair sí a cuid scolaíochta agus ní in Éirinn
result.html: Aisteach go leor ba i Sasana a fuair sí a cuid scolaíochta agus ní in ÉirinnStrangely enough, she got her education in England and not in Ireland.
result.ponchtml: Aisteaċ go leor ba i Sasana a fuair sí a cuid scolaíoċta agus ní in ÉirinnStrangely enough, she got her education in England and not in Ireland.

result.eng: He is coming over from England.
result.ga: Tá sé ag teacht anall as Sasana
result.orig: Tá sé ag teacht anall as Sasana
result.html: Tá sé ag teacht anall as SasanaHe is coming over from England.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé ag teaċt anall as SasanaHe is coming over from England.

result.eng: Three are in America, two in Australia, another two in England and one in South Africa.
result.ga: Tá triúr i Meiriceá beirt san Astráil beirt eile i Sasana agus duine eile san Afraic Theas
result.orig: Tá triúr i Meiriceá beirt san Astráil beirt eile i Sasana agus duine eile san Afraic Theas
result.html: Tá triúr i Meiriceá beirt san Astráil beirt eile i Sasana agus duine eile san Afraic TheasThree are in America, two in Australia, another two in England and one in South Africa.
result.ponchtml: Tá triúr i Meiriceá beirt san Astráil beirt eile i Sasana agus duine eile san Afraic ṪeasThree are in America, two in Australia, another two in England and one in South Africa.
